list_definition.definition: to give (a person) a job or position

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They have appointed a new manager.

list_definition.definition: to fix or agree on (a time for something)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Has a day been appointed yet for the meeting?
